name: Lightspeed
description: Lightspeed (SPEED) is a cross-chain token, facilitating seamless transactions across multiple blockchain networks, enhancing overall efficiency. $Speed is a deflationary cryptocurrency, available on Arbitrum, Base, BSC, ETH, Optimism & Polygon. No added fees or taxes. Powered by Warpcore rewards and deflation engine. Want to move your $Speed? Move across chains with Axelar interchain or Squidrouter.
